RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 1 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 50. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, if for $3,200, allowed 3 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREIBURG stalked pace, roused, assumed command far turn. GOLDEN TIGER away alertly, set pace, gave way far turn, held place. MAXIMUS THE GREAT good position, evenly, no threat. XTREME LYRA void early speed, trailed, no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, gave way far turn, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Freiburg
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, roused, assumed command far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Xtreme Lyra
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, trailed, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 5500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $2,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Weights, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SINGANDCRYINDUBAI rushed to lead, set pace, well handled, best. LADDIE BOY broke in air, tr, steady advance, closed willingly. DANCE FOR RANSOM broke sharply, stalked pace, evenly. LOST THE MINISTER unhurried early, quick move backstretch, tired stretch. FRIENDOFTHECOURT stalked pace, drifted out first turn, raced wide, no factor.

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, tr, steady advance, closed willingly,

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HASTA BE A MOOSE odds on winner. ARLEN'S PROSPECT chased, second best. RIDGEFIELD ROCKET rail trip, no threat. JANES ONE SPOT close early, bore out turn.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 4 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 56. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 5500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weights, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $2,500 (Montana Breds Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HANKY PRANKY 3 wide first turn, circled field 2nd turn, drew off. STEALING HEARTS away alertly, set pace, gave way upper stretch. GEBO void early speed, trailed, no factor. RACE.RACE_TEXT: BHS Futurity MILES CITY RACE 8 250 Y Dirt CR: 73. Futurity Purse 21000. FOR 2 YEARS OLD THAT HAVE QUALIFIED 1 - 8 AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE BHS QUARTER HORSE FUTURITY BY TIME TRIALS THAT RAN ON MAY 7, 2023. No Sex Allowance. No Also Eligible. Weight: 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE FABULOUS DYNASTY best from gate. Y O FIFTY CONCERTS broke outward, finished strong. BHR FLASHING NICKERS close throughout. COME TOGETHER clean run, mild rally. EYESA FAST ONE broke inward, bothered, no factor. MOON EM N DASH lugged in throughout. SHOOTER ZOOM bumped start. ICON DOIT fractious in gate, ducked in gate.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 10 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 69. Allowance Purse 5500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weights, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC IN A HAT 3 wide first turn, circled field 2nd turn, closed with a rush. NUMMY NUM dueled, outfinished, second best. MONGOLIAN DIAMOND saved ground on rail, stalked pace, evenly, passed tiring rivals. TOP HAT CAT dueled, tired, faded. IMA CARPE DIEM checked first turn, trailed, no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 12 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 5500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weights, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUR PETUNIA bumped first turn, assumed command backstretch, as rider pleased. TRICKY MOM saved ground on rail, roused 2nd turn, mild rally. BLUEGRASS SOUL taken back first turn, good position, closed willingly stretch. IMA TROUBLE MAKER bore out, bumped, steady fade. SANDPLUM CREEK void early speed, trailed, no factor. UNTETHERED SOUL rushed up, used up, empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Tricky Mom
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground on rail, roused 2nd turn, mild rally,
